Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    File: Player.java Description: abstract Class used to store fields and methods associated with Players in RACKO, both HumanPlayer and ComputerPlayer inherit from this Date Created: 2/5/2014 Last Modified: 2/24/2014

      Player(int playerNum, Deck main, java.lang.Boolean show, java.util.ArrayList<Card> cardsToPlace)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void emptyRack() 
      void fillRack(Deck main)
      method called from constructor that populates player's rack from the main (shuffled) deck
      int getCurrentScore()
      calculates current score, used in context menus in Multiplayer mode
      abstract char getInput(int dValue)
      This method gets the AI input for the first wave of decision making
      abstract char getKeepOrNot(Card temp)
      This method gets AI decision from ComputerPlayer about keeping a card it has drawn from main
      abstract char getSwapInput(Card temp)
      This method polls the AI to get which position in the rack it would like to swap with
      abstract void resetRackFlags()
      Method resets the AI rack flags used in AI decision making during swap polls
      void setIsTurn(boolean t)
      This method sets the player's isTurn flag on or off
      java.lang.String showHand()
      show's the player's hand, used mainly in testing
      void wins()
      sets isWinner flag to true

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int playerNum,
      Deck main,
      boolean showCards)
        constructor with playerNum and the main Deck Object passed as arguments. initializes player id and rack, passes main deck to fillRack() method
        Parameters:
        playerNum - player ID
        main - main deck
        showCards - are cards visible?

      • Player

        public Player(int playerNum,
      Deck main,
      java.lang.Boolean show,
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> cardsToPlace)
        alternate constructor for when in oMode, has an additional argument for cardsToPlace directly into rack, calling an alternate fillRack() method
        Parameters:
        playerNum - player ID
        main - main deck
        show -
        cardsToPlace - array used in oMode
